mapper.insert: insert into SpaceOwner( spaceno, userId, isauth, carno, memo, createBy, createTime, modifyBy, modifyTime ) values( #{spaceno}, #{userId}, #{isauth}, #{carno}, #{memo}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyTime} )
mapper.update: update SpaceOwner set userId = #{userId}, isauth = #{isauth}, carno = #{carno}, memo = #{memo}, modifyBy = #{modifyBy}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where spaceno = #{spaceno}
